eng.start_access_granted:

eng.start_deeplink_info:
You can start the bot with a key (deep-link):
`/start <KEY_HERE>`
Or just send me the key in a message.
eng.help_commands:
Commands:
/start ‚Äî start
/help ‚Äî help
/logout ‚Äî remove access (locally)

After authorization, just send a photo/image file.
eng.logout_success: Ok, access removed. To use again ‚Äî send the key.
eng.photo_need_key: Access key required first. Send the key or `/start <key>`.
eng.document_read_error: Could not read image from file. Try another image.
eng.document_convert_error: Could not properly convert file. Try JPG/PNG/WebP.
eng.document_unsupported_format: Unsupported file format. Send JPG/PNG/WebP (or photo directly).
